prompt_template: Fetch cpu utilization data from the cpu_utilization_data stream. You are an anomaly detection agent, your task is to detect the anomalies from the given data. The output should include: A tabular summary showing only the anomalous values along with relevant context - Have different tables/reports based on metric_name The output should be in html format. With report summarizing the anomalies detected with some metric_name and asset_id at the top. Any additional relevant information that could help in understanding the anomalies. Color Theme forr Output HTML (use CSS function light-dark) - Regular Text foreground: color:light-dark(#000000, #FFFFFF) - Regular background-color: light-dark(#FFFFFF, #000000)
template_description: Use this template to detect the anamolies
